site_name: C I Tower, Office North West
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Removal of 3no. antennas and replaced with 3no. new antenna, as well as 1no. antenna to be relocated on new support pole. Addition of 3no. future ERS and relocation of existing ERS units relocated onto 1no.new sloping pole bracket on brace pole. The existing GPS is to be relocated and ancillary development thereto.
decision_conditions: The siting and appearance would be appropriate in this case and would accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

Thames Water would recommend that petrol / oil interceptors be fitted in all car parking/washing/repair facilities.Failure to enforce the effective use of petrol / oil interceptors could result in oil polluted discharges entering local watercourses.

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY: On the 1st May 2024 the Council adopted a new Householder Local List. Please ensure that your application submission includes all the necessary documentation as required by the new local list. Then please complete and submit a Householder Checklist - Section 3 to confirm that you have provided all mandatory documents  The new Householder Local List and checklists can be obtained via the council's website: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applicationsThe LPA will not conduct any validation checks until the correct Checklist has been submitted. Upon receipt of a completed Checklist, the application will be assigned to a validation officer to review. Please do not simply state N/A anywhere in the checklist without a written justification. If you need to make any changes to your application please try to do this via the Planning Portal website where possible. If that is not possible please send amended documents via the email address quoted in this letter.
